a.span: Click here for information on weather-related school closings

// function popGrid() { theurl = 'pagecalpop.cfm?p=3128&calview=grid'; theurl += '&period=month' properties = 'toolbar=yes,location=no,directories=no,status=no,menubar=yes,scrollbars=yes,resizable=yes'; popgrid = window.open(theurl,'gridpop',properties); popgrid.focus(); } //]]
    • SatApr25 Prom Grand March CANCELLED 4:00 PMFHS Auditorium
    • SatApr25 FHS Prom CANCELLED 8:00 PM to 11:00 PM
    • MonApr27 ECFE classes, Creative Play Center closed
    • MonApr27 NO SCHOOL
    • MonApr27 Tiger Club open

Coronavirus (COVID-19):

Information & Resources for Families


Click the buttons below to find more information on Distance Learning, Meals for Students, Student Support Services and other Resources,
and Child Care for children of First Responders, healthcare workers and other emergency workers.

    

    

 

Additional Resources   
  • Minnesota Department of Health: COVID-19 Information for Schools  
  • Minnesota Department of Health: Coronavirus Updates  
  • Centers for Disease Control: Covid website
  • Center for Disease Control: Travel Guide 
  • Minnesota Department of Education - COVID-19 Updates 
  • Fridley Public Schools - Information for Families
 
Communications and updates for families 



Stay Connected
To ensure that our families stay connected, the district has created this weekly series of e-newsletters to keep you up-to-date with the latest information, provide helpful resources and links, and share news stories from the district and schools.
Click here to view the April 3, 2020 Stay Connected
Click here to view the April 9, 2020 Stay Connected
Click here to view the April 17, 2020 Stay Connected

Messages from the Superintendent
Fridley Public Schools Superintendent Dr. Kim Hiel has sent several messages to Fridley families, click the links below to view:
Message from Superintendent Hiel - March 29, 2020
Message from Superintendent Hiel - March 25, 2020

Messages to Fridley Families
Click below to view the messages to Fridley families:

COVID-19 Update 8 for Families
COVID-19 Update 7 for Families
COVID-19 Update 6 for Families
COVID-19 Update 5 for Families
COVID-19 Update 4 for Families
COVID-19 Update 3 for Families
COVID-19 Update 2 for Families
COVID-19 Update 1 for Families
